text: West Azarbaijan or West Azerbaijan (, Āzarbāijān-e Gharbī; ; ) is one of the 30 provinces of Iran. The province of West Azarbaijan covers an area of 39,487 km² (or 43,660 km² including Lake Urmia). The capital city of the province is Urmia. The majority of the population of the province consists of Azerbaijanis with a smaller minority of Persians. == References == == Other websites ==
title: West Azerbaijan province
